name: PRO_GEN_PAY_EMP_CODE
body_snippet:
Procedure Pro_Gen_Pay_Emp_Code (lvn_pay_org_id NUMBER) is
  
  Cursor pay_emp is
  Select pem.emp_Code , pem.emp_full_name
  From   PAY_EMPLOYEE_MT pem ,
         PAY_EMP_HIRING_INFO_MT pehim,
         PAY_ORGANIZATION_MT pom
  Where  pem.pay_emp_id = pehim.pay_emp_id
  And    pom.pay_org_id = pehim.pay_org_id
  And    pom.pay_org_id = lvn_pay_org_id; -- <<Pay Employees Of Specific Pay_Organization >>
  
  cc_res NUMBER;
  lvc_emp_code VARCHAR2(200);
  lvn_struct_id number;
  TYPE codes Is Table Of VARCHAR2(250) Index By BINARY_INTEGER;
  lvt_codes codes;
  
Begin

 Select  wgsbm.structure_id into lvn_struct_id
 From    pay_organization_mt pom ,wiz_gl_set_of_books wgsbm
 Where   pom.set_of_book_id=wgsbm.set_of_book_id
 And     pom.pay_org_id=lvn_pay_org_id;
 
 Exception
         WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN return;
 
 Select  t.employee_acc_code , t.employer_acc_code , t.surplus_acc_code , t.others_acc_code
 Into    lvt_codes(1) , lvt_codes(2) , lvt_codes(3) , lvt_codes(4)
 From    PAY_ORG_PFT_ACCTS_CONFIG_MT t
 Where   t.pay_org_id=lvn_pay_org_id;
 
  For    ptr_pay_emp In pay_emp Loop
         lvc_emp_code :=  SubStr( ptr_pay_emp.emp_code , instr(ptr_pay_emp.emp_code,'-')+1 , Length(ptr_pay_emp.emp_code) );--<<Get Employee number code after "-" Sign>>
         For cnt_indx In 1 .. 4 Loop
             if lvt_codes(cnt_indx) is not null then
                cc_res := Dynamic_Create_Seg_Combination(lvn_struct_id , lvt_codes(cnt_indx),
